Title: UVA Department of Computer Science
Body: Date: Tue, 26 Nov 1996 22:19:16 GMT Server: Apache/1.0.3 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 6197 Last-modified: Mon, 04 Nov 1996 06:08:25 GMT UVA Department of Computer Science Bill Wulf is elected President of the National Academy of Engineering Our new Chair, Jack Stankovic (effective January '97) Alice : a 3D interactive Graphics Progamming Environment Legion : A World Wide Virtual Computer Proposed new CS building Email all comments to webman@cs.virginia.edu
